availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, constable. Kentucky native. Married to Berthena Ray. Father of Harrison Ray, Sarah R. Ray, Angelina Ray, Moses Ray, George N. Ray, Catherine Ray, Patsy Ray, Nancy E. Ray, and Malinda Ray. Constable in Garrard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, p. 91.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, p. 24.
Find A Grave, "Joseph Ray (April 6, 1828-May 6, 1882)," Memorial #86333573, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/86333573 (accessed May 11, 2018).
